DOC.brief_summary: This study explore safety effectiveness different dos AGN 203818 treat pain associate fibromyalgia syndrome . The study conduct 2 part . Part A enrolled 211 pt dose either 3 , 20 , 60 mg BID AGN 203818 placebo 4 week treatment duration . Part B enroll 440 pt dose either 20 , 100 , 160 mg BID AGN 203818 placebo 12 week treatment duration .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy AGN 203818 Pain Associated With Fibromyalgia Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis fibromyalgia syndrome Moderate severe pain associate fibromyalgia Any uncontrolled disease Pregnant nursing female
